{{{
@Join
class GroupAndUser {
    @fields("groupKey,groupName")
    Group group;
    @fields("roleType")
    GroupUser groupUser;
    @fields("*")
    User user;
}

@Table
class Group {
    @Column(primaryKey=true)
    Long groupKey;
    @Column
    String groupName;
}

@Table
class GroupUser {
    @Column(references="Group.groupKey")
    Long groupKey;
    @Column(references="User.userKey")
    Long userKey;
}

@Table
class User {
    @Column(primaryKey=true)
    Long userKey;
}

Group group = new Group();
group.setGroupKey(1);
GroupAndUser gu = new GroupAndUser();
gu.setGroup(group);
entityManager.list(gu);

SELECT A.group_key group_groupKey, A.group_name, group_groupName, B.role_type groupUser_roleType, C.user_key user_userKey
FROM NC_GROUP A INNER JOIN NC_GROUP_USER B ON A.group_key = B.group_key INNER JOIN NC_USER C ON B.user_key = C.user_key
WHERE A.group_key = 1
